comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Seems like Mrs. R. H. Davis is Mrs. Richard Harding Davis. Harding's second wife was Bessie McCoy (c1886-1931), a Vaudeville performer--they wed in 1899, he died 1916. Harding was a journalist associated with the Hearst papers, but he also wrote a lot of stories that were adapted for Broadway shows. www.ibdb.com/person.php?id=68280 www.nndb.com/people/398/000048254/

comment._content: LOC: Caption is erroneously repeated from next photo with sister.

comment._content: Thank you pennylrichardsca for the additional info and artolog for the title error. We'll update our information.
